name: TeensyEncoderTool
keywords: teensy, pjrc, encoder, multiplexed, polling, 74165, shift register
description: TeensyEncoderTool is a library to manage and read out rotary encoders connected either directly or via multiplexers. TeensyEncoderTool supports the common types of encoders (full / quad / half) and some variants. It provides periodic and limit modes and can invoke callbacks on value changes.
